column4: presumably, you tried to remove evolution-data-server. evolution-data-server is a core part of GNOME and not really what you're thinking of when you think of evolution.
you are right. I did try to remove them. so they are developed by evolution but not relate to the email client?
as I understand it, it was developed for evolution and is now used by gnomish things in general.
Got it. I will try to not remove them the next time. Thanks
